reviews.text: The delivery was delayed by more than an hour and the food was cold. Tracking updates were also wrong.
Food was missing from my order and customer support did not resolve the issue. Need better service.
The app is easy to use but the checkout process is very confusing. Please simplify payment flow.
Delivery was quick and food quality was good. But please add more vegetarian options.
Cold food and late delivery again. This keeps happening and is very frustrating.
Order had missing items. Rider was also rude. Very poor experience.
App looks modern but often crashes during payment. Please fix bugs in the app.
Food was tasty and fresh. Delivery was on time. Please add wallet payment option.
Delivery rider was rude and did not handle the package properly. Food was spilled inside the bag.
Search function in the app is not accurate. Please improve so I can find dishes faster.
Worst experience ever. Food was cold, delivery was late, and two items were missing.
Good service overall. Please add more discounts for regular customers.
Tracking system is inaccurate. Delivery was late and food arrived cold.
Checkout is too slow and often fails during payment. Please improve app stability.
Amazing experience! Fast delivery, hot food, and very polite rider. Best so far.
Rider was rude and food was missing again. Very poor service quality.
Please improve the app search and add better filters for cuisine.
Food was fresh and tasty. Delivery was quick. Please add more payment methods.
Late delivery, cold food, and careless packaging. Very disappointed.
Checkout experience is confusing. Please redesign the payment flow.
